Key Match Events: Roland Sallai scored in the 32nd minute
Virgil van Dijk was sent off in the 79th minute
Denzel Dumfries equalized in the 83rd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Virgil van Dijk praised for his performance despite being sent off
Netherlands' performance was noted as difficult with 84% possession in the first half
Hungary's defensive work, especially in the second half, was highlighted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary made the breakthrough in the 32nd minute with a goal from Sallai
Van Dijk received a red card for a lunge on Csoboth
Dumfries scored the equalizer with a header from a free kick in the 83rd minute
